medrc
  • Get Started

Reference version 1.0-0

Fitting hierarchical dose resonse models

medrm

Mixed effects dose-response curves

metadrm

2-stage estimation in hierarchical dose-response models via meta-analysis

glsdrm

Dose-response curve estimation by generalized least squares

Dose-response functions

meAR.2 meAR.3

Asymptotic regression model

meEXD.2 meEXD.3

Exponential decay model

meL.2 meL.3 meL.4 meL.5

The logistic model

meLL.2 meLL.3 meLL.4 meLL.5

The log-logistic function

meLN.2 meLN.3 meLN.4 meLLN.4

Log-normal dose-response model

meW1.2 meW1.3 meW1.4 meW2.2 meW2.3 meW2.4

Four-parameter Weibull functions

Derived parameters

BMD

BMD estimation for medrc or glsdrc models

BMDadjresp

Adjusted ED response levels for BMD estimation based on medrc or glsdrc models

BMDmarg

Marginal BMD estimation for medrc models

EDmarg

Estimating marginal effective doses for medrc objects

mmaBMD

BMD estimation for averaged medrc or glsdrc models

mmaED

ED estimation for averaged medrc and glsdrc models

Misc

LL4.loged LN4.loged W14.loged W24.loged

ED and BMD estimation on log scale

mmplot

Plot multiple medrc objects

plot

Plot gdrc objects

plot

Plot medrc objects
